admin.artemis.title: Artemis
admin.artemis.name: Artemis Options
admin.login.theme.title: Choose the theme you want to use
admin.login.theme.description: If you want to see them in action, please go to your profile page and customize your current admin theme.
admin.login.url.title: Custom login page URL
admin.login.url.description: Define a custom login page URL instead of the very known wp-login slug.
admin.login.error.title: Use Artemis custom error message to increase your security?
admin.login.error.description: Whatever the error, the message "%s" will be displayed.
admin.login.headertitle.title: Header title
admin.login.headertitle.description: Define a custom title for your login page.
admin.login.headerurl.title: Use your own Website URL on the logo?
admin.login.shake.title: Keep the shake login animation on error?
welcome.title: This is where it all begins
welcome.intro:
Thanks so much for joining us and using our excellent Artemis Backend Theme plugin.
You are on your way to customize and enhance your WordPress admin panel experience!
welcome.howto.title: How-to
welcome.howto.content.first:
The Artemis Backend Theme plugin is built with %d admin themes described below.
You can define yours in your profile page.
welcome.howto.content.second: You can customize as well your website Login page by choosing the admin login theme you want.
welcome.adminthemes.title: Admin themes
welcome.packages.title: Recommended Olympus packages
welcome.packages.olympus.title: Olympus framework
welcome.packages.olympus.description: The Olympus framework, your simple, easy to use and powerfull framework to deploy and work with WordPress.
welcome.packages.zeus.title: Olympus Zeus
welcome.packages.zeus.description: The Olympus Zeus framework core system used to make all your WordPress plugins and themes developments easier and efficient.
welcome.outro.author: Author: Achraf Chouk - Copyright: MIT Licence
